item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.4.6
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.4.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 05 Feb 2020 14:31:06 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.9.4.6]
- build w/ Instrument.lvclass v1.4.2.53
- updated Lockin Client.vi
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Cryostation v1.1.1.7
item.description:
Product: Cryostation v1.1.1.7
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 05 Feb 2020 11:31:03 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging Montana Instruments Cryostation status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for getting information from the Cryostation.

Release Notes: [1.1.1.7]
- update the way Cryostation Client.vi handles port and address configuration
- build w/ Instrument.lvclass v1.4.2.53
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Instruments v1.4.2.53
item.description:
Product: Instruments v1.4.2.53
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 05 Feb 2020 10:48:12 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Abstract instrument.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.4.2.53]
- Add "Finished?" boolean to Get Magnet/Temperature/Delay
- Change the way the Instrument SMO is configured (dev must override SMO Name/Port/Public API/RC Tyle - constant.vi)
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: XY Utilities v1.0.2.3
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.0.2.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 23 Jan 2020 11:15:07 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- Arithmetic: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide
- Array: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Subset, Sway X and Y, Get X and Y
- DSP: Derivative, Average, Interpolate, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum

Release Notes: [1.0.2.3]
- Add Symmetrize.vi
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Graph Utilities v2.0.1.2
item.description:
Product: Graph Utilities v2.0.1.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 23 Jan 2020 10:48:01 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Misc. graph utilities

Release Notes: [2.0.1.2]
Bug Fixes:
- Issue #1: Misc. bug fixes when converting an XY Graph to Intensity Graph
- Issue #3: Linecut width defaults to 1 pixel if user enters "0"

New Methods:
- Get/Set XY Graph X (Y) Mapping.vi (Get/Set Linear or Logarithmic XY Scales)
- Get/Set XY Graph Plot Names.vi
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LVtoITX v2.8.0.9
item.description:
Product: LVtoITX v2.8.0.9
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 22 Jan 2020 17:18:18 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read Igor Text Files (*.itx) and text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat).

Release Notes: [2.8.0.9]
New APIs for reading TDMS files:
- Read TDMS Wavenames into Rings.vi (reads TDMS channel names and populates ring control(s)
- Read TDMS XYN.vi (read three waves X,Y,N from TDMS file or folder of TDMS files)

Igor Graph VIs
- LV to ITX Graph.vi renamed LV to Igor Graph (UI).vi. UI that lets user copy data and write ITX file for loading into Igor
- Intensity Graph to Igor Graph.vi and XY Graph to Igor Graph.vi: call as subVI with graph reference to write ITX files
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.3.2.9
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.3.2.9
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 14 Jan 2020 12:33:04 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.3.2.9]
- misc. bug fixes related to saving TDMS files
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.3.5
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.3.5
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 14 Jan 2020 11:45:09 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.9.3.5]
- build w/ Instrument.lvclass v1.4.1.52
- update waveguide modeling in simulation mode
- update sweep API icons
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.3.0.7
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.3.0.7
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 09 Jan 2020 12:45:23 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.3.0.7]
- Device and User strings are written to DSC processes (configured for PPMS1, PPMS2, MNK, DR200, THz1, MFP3D, Cypher) by Control Experiment.vi
- Cryostat class is configured for:
-- PPMS1 (Magnet, Temperature)
-- PPMS2 (Magnet, Temperature, Rotator)
-- MNK (Magnet, Temperature)
-- DR200 (Magnet)
-- THz1 (Temperature)
- Transport and Sweep Control VIs save TDMS files by default
-- Use dictionaries to store intermediate values of parameters before saving
item.dc:creator: Levylab
